description:
One pole for your whole winter season. With touring features from grip to tip, these light poles are made for backcountry skiers who dabble across the alpine. The adjustable length plus extended grip makes this pole a versatile sidekick for all your winter shenanigans.

  • 7075-T6 aluminum construction is light, durable and economical
  • 2-piece design is stable and strong
  • Powerlock 3.0 mechanism is strong and easy to secure
  • Insulating EVA grips with rubber extensions so you can move your hand lower on the shaft
  • Padded straps are buckle-free for comfort
  • Interchangeable Vario snowflake baskets with carbide tips
name: MEC Tour 2 Poles
